fr.emn.easymol.xml
Class MoleculeXMLReader

java.lang.Object
  fr.emn.easymol.xml.MoleculeXMLReader

public class MoleculeXMLReader
extends java.lang.Object

A class to read a molecule description from a XML file.

The MoleculeXMLReader class is used to load a molecule described in a file. The description of the Molecule must be in the EasyMol XML format (see the user's guide for more information) for the class to load it. After reading, the two objects returned by the class are the Molecule itself and the hash code of the first element.

See Also:
Molecule, MoleculeXMLWriter
